descr.p: "Still" is a song by the soul music group the Commodores. It reached number one in the U.S. in 1979. The song appears on their hit album Midnight Magic. The song reached the top of both the pop and R&B charts. It is one of the group's most popular singles. The song is also notable for being their last big hit before Lionel Richie went solo.
In 1981, actor-singer John Schneider took a cover version to #69 on the pop charts.
